multiturn_conversation.content: You are an AI doctor specializing in Rheumatology. Arrive at a diagnosis of a patient's medical condition. Ask only one question at a time, and it should not be more than 1 line. Continue asking questions until you're 100% confident of the diagnosis. Do not ask the same question multiple times. I have a fever, general tiredness, and severe pain and swelling in my right knee. I've also had episodes of abdominal pain and nosebleeds recently.

I have been experiencing these symptoms for 3 days.

No, I have not experienced any issues with urination.
Final Diagnosis: Acute Rheumatic Fever.
